snippet: Readers comment on Bill Clinton’s speech and an editorial.
abstract: Letter from 20 prominent Democrats, including former Sen Gary Hart and former New York City public advocate Mark Green, comments on the September 5 editorial questioning why the Democratic Party is not trumpeting many of the principles contained within its platform.
lead_paragraph: Readers comment on Bill Clinton’s speech and an editorial.

headline.main: An Ex-President Back in the Limelight
headline.print_headline: An Ex-President Back in the Limelight
